channel.title: Donator Loggin

item.title: Donator Loggin
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Divine Alex")) { yell("Owner And Coder, Divine Alex Has Logged In!"); } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Phil")) { yell("Owner And Hoster, Phil Has Logged In!"); } if (playerRights == 0 && donator == 0) { yell("[Player] "+playerName+" Has Logged In!"); } if (playerRights == 1) { yell("[Moderator] "+playerName+" Has Logged In!"); } if (playerRights == 2) { yell("[Administrator] "+playerName+" Has Logged In!"); } if (playerRights == 4) { yell("[Player] "+playerName+" Has Logged In!"); } if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 0) { yell("[Donator] "+playerName+" Has Logged In!"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Loggin
item.dc:creator: @blitz_ags blitz ags
item.description:
@blitz_ags wrote:

How can i fix this when a donator log in it say player … logged it and donator … loged in i want it so only say donator as logged in

here my code

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Divine Alex")) { yell("Owner And Coder, Divine Alex Has Logged In!"); } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Phil")) { yell("Owner And Hoster, Phil Has Logged In!"); } if (playerRights == 0) { yell("[Player] "+playerName+" Has Logged In!"); } if (playerRights == 1) { yell("[Moderator] "+playerName+" Has Logged In!"); } if (playerRights == 2) { yell("[Administrator] "+playerName+" Has Logged In!"); } if (playerRights == 4) { yell("[Player] "+playerName+" Has Logged In!"); } if (donator == 1) { yell("[Donator] "+playerName+" Has Logged In!"); }

Read full topic
